title: How to Make German Gold Pound Cake

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.
steps.description: Grease and flour a 10-inch tube or Bundt pan.

steps.headline: Cream butter and sugar together in a large mixing bowl.
Beat on high speed until mixture is fluffy.
Add a good squeeze of lemon juice, just enough to scent the batter with the lemon flavor.
Beat 2 minutes more gradually increasing mixer speed from low to high.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until cake tests done.
Let cake stand in pan 10 minutes before turning out onto wire cooling racks.
Serve with fresh sweetened strawberries and softly whipped cream.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC. Grease and flour a 10-inch tube or Bundt pan. Cream butter and sugar together in a large mixing bowl.  Beat on high speed until mixture is fluffy.  Reduce speed to low.  Add the remaining ingredients.  Add a good squeeze of lemon juice, just enough to scent the batter with the lemon flavor.  Beat 2 minutes more gradually increasing mixer speed from low to high.  Pour into prepared pan.  Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until cake tests done.  Let cake stand in pan 10 minutes before turning out onto wire cooling racks.  Let cool completely before serving.  Serve with fresh sweetened strawberries and softly whipped cream.  Serves 16.
